greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,m) = A127093 * A126988 read by rows.
comment: Multiply the infinite lower triangular matrices A127093 and A126988.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
maple: A127093 := proc(n,m) if n mod m = 0 then m; else 0 ; fi; end:
A126988 := proc(n,k) if n mod k = 0 then n/k; else 0; fi; end:
for n from 1 to 15 do for m from 1 to n do printf("%d,",A127097(n,m)) ; od: od: # _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 18 2009
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 05 2007
ext: A-numbers corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 18 2009
